reviewText: I'm not an expert.I am NOT a professional reviewer--though I play one on Amazondotcom--I live in a country ("across the 'pond'") where if I want to SEE thisshow I have to BUY the videos.I do know what I like.I LOVE this show.==> There are 11 Seasons available in 7, so-called, numbered, collectionsMythbusters: Collection 2Mythbusters - Collection 3Mythbusters: Collection 4Mythbusters: Collection 5Mythbusters: Collection 6Mythbusters Collection 7Mythbusters: Collection 8MythBusters: Collection 9and several other buying options. Such as:Mythbusters: Urban LegendsYou CAN buy entire seasons---if you can find them-- and evencomplete--so far--seasons for as much as $400. Like:Mythbusters Complete Seasons 1 2 3 4 5 (One Two Three Four Five)Since you cannot list more than 10 inserted recommendations, there are SEVERALyou'll have to find on your own.I recommend buying the s-e-v-e-n [numbered] collections-- NOT seasons --like I did.I bought some from AMAZON, and others when I saw them on the shelves ofthe PX I work at.Buy them here... some of the early collections are either unavailable,or outragiously-priced.HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
Title: Mythbusters: Collection 1

reviewText: I was never that interested in science and technology, which made school rather boring and even a little difficult. I wish I had found this show sooner! Jamie and Adam explain the details in a way people of all ages and learning can understand, and they make even the most disgusting/weird topics intriguing. They mainly handle urban legends, but have expanded in recent years to include internet videos and real life incidents. Humor, science, and huge explosions--what else do you want from an educational show?
Title: Mythbusters: Collection 1

reviewText: This is such a great show!  Both Adam and Jamie's personalities totally make it!  Each episode is them exploring whether or not certain myths are even plausible.  But it's their approach that makes this show a winner!  I highly recommend getting the whole series!  (You can also catch current episodes on the Discovery Channel on Wednesday nights!)
summary: Get your fun and science too!
Title: Mythbusters: Collection 1

reviewText: The purchase was made for middle school science classes. I haven't really watched all the episodes, just enough to know that the students will enjoy them. The series was recommended by the eighth grade science teachers in my building. I plan on separating the four disks into different packages as I know if one teacher checks out the four disk pack I may never see it again.
Title: Mythbusters: Collection 1

reviewText: The premise of the show is well documented. Two special effects experts and their staff take on common myths (and many not so common) and subject them to the scientific method.The principals are all personable and obviously enjoy this work. That is important to the success of the show. Without their enthusiasm some of the things they film could be quite dry.Whether exploring household myths such as whether it is safe to eat a piece of food that drops on the floor, or exploring tactics used in movies, you'll learn a lot and have fun doing it.Highly recommended show.
Title: Mythbusters: Collection 1

reviewText: I've waited a long time for some of these favorite episodes to come out in a collection, to make my mind up if I wanted to buy everything year by year or on iTunes.  This Collection has many of my favorite episodes, but is not inclusive, so I'll buy the years as they become available.  Go Mythbusters!
Title: Mythbusters: Collection 1

reviewText: Got myth? Who are you going to call?Consider - the lovely quiet Jamie Hyneman and the eclectically loud and funny Adam Savage, THE MYTHBUSTERS plus (their beautiful and wonderful staff of Mythbusters: Kari Byron, Jessi Combs, Grant Imahara, Tory Belleci, Robert Lee, Nikos Andronikos and so forth...)I saw one of their TV Show Seasons and I've purchased all of their TV Show Seasons available for sale, plus all of the 10 Collections and All of their Specials.Yes, entertaining, worthwhile and something that never gets old, great explosions, curious informational tid-bits everybody should have whether it is a James Bond special effects or some other show, etc... Something for everybody! Buy it before they're gone, hurry up! I love this show!
Title: Mythbusters: Collection 1

reviewText: Ahh, the Mythbusters: if you haven't stumbled upon this show on the Discovery Channel yet, what are you waiting for?  Over the years, Adam and Jamie (and Tory, Grant, and Kari) have thoroughly tackled some of our greatest urban myths, legends, and simply bizarre ideas, using their vast areas of knowlege in the sciences.  Watching an episode is like watching the scientific method at work, and the personalities of Adam and Jamie make the show extremely entertaining.  The projects they do are great for kids to see (although sometimes their language might not be appropriate for young people, depending on how uptight you are about that sort of thing) because they show how working through a problem can lead to very interesting results.  I've learned a lot by watching this show.This DVD set is very bare-bones.  Only one behind-the-scenes feature, no commentaries, just full-length episodes (I think there may be some extra footage thrown in here and there; there are a couple small experiments that I don't remember seeing from the TV version).  Plus, the episodes they chose for the set seem kind of arbitrary, just random ones from seasons 2 and 3.  However, the new low price is MUCH better than the $60 or so you used to have to pay at the Discovery Channel website.  I recommend this set to anyone who has ever been curious about their world.  You will not be disappointed.
Title: Mythbusters: Collection 1
